text: Prince Souphanouvong (13 July 1909 - 9 January 1995) was a Laotian politician. He was the first President of Laos from December 1975 to August 1991. He was nicknamed "The Red Prince". He was a founding leader of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.Souphanouvong, Prince. The Columbia Encyclopedia, 6th ed.. Columbia University Press Souphanouvong died on 9 January 1995 at the age of 86.Souphanouvong, "red prince'' of Laos, dies aged 86. Hartford-hwp.com (1995-01-12). title: Souphanouvong
